thread.title: Ignore bad reviews we loved it
thread.title_full: Ignore bad reviews we loved it - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jules-bernie
title: Ignore bad reviews we loved it
text: Just come back from staying 3 nights at the roosevelt and I must say I was very impressed this hotel is amazing lobby was fabulous. Hotel room was a bit small but wasn't init much a bit nosey at night but the hotel is very old stayed on the 9th floor came out of the lift and I thought we were on the SHINNING set (here's jonny )lifts a bit slow, but ha ho room clean, bed was comfortable, shower was hot only downfall the residents bar is very expensive but we're in new York I suppose x met a few lovely people. Moon was such a lovely lady and Tony from London bought everyone at the bar a drink HAPPY DAYS X can't wait to come back x
